content: this is an original pattern written in english using us crochet terms the pattern is for a crocheted hat worked top down and finished with a post stitch ribbing the main section of the hat is crocheted using the boxed bead stitch to create a textured portion the hat pattern comes with instructions for the hat in 5 different sizes- adult m/l adult s/teen child toddler and 3-6 month baby the hats are made with worsted weight yarn samples made with red heart super saver stripes finished size adult m/l adult s/teen child toddler and 3-6 month supplies worsted weight yarn in desired color i crochet hook 5 25 mm yarn needle
